entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:44 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
